citation.article-title: Proposal to replace the illegitimate genus name Schineria Toth et al. 2001 with the genus name Ignatzschineria gen. nov. and to replace the illegitimate combination Schineria larvae Toth et al. 2001 with Ignatzschineria larvae comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Ignatzschineria (Ig.natz.schi.ne′ri.a. N.L. fem. n. Ignatzschineria in honour of Ignatz Rudolph Schiner, who described the fly Wohlfahrtia magnifica in 1862).
Previous illegitimate name: Schineria Tóth et al. 2001.
The description of the genus is as given for Schineria in Tóth et al. (2001).
The type species is Ignatzschineria larvae (Tóth et al., 2001).
